hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #a Goron Tunic# can be found in #the Haunted Wasteland#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# hoards #a Heart Container#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Deku Stick#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #a Slingshot# can be found at #Hyrule Castle#.
hinted_locations: Market Treasure Chest Game Room 5 Bottom

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nuts (10 pieces)#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that a room containing a #large pot in the Shadow Temple# holds...^ #Arrows (10 pieces)# and #the Mirror Shield#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple GS Single Giant Pot

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# is on the path to #Bongo Bongo#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #the Fire Arrows#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that plundering #Goron City# is a foolish choice.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# hoards #a Hylian Shield#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #ReDead in the royal tomb# guard #Epona's Song#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #crater's melody# is #Zelda's Lullaby#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Hallway Right Invisible Chest

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: May the way of the Hero lead to the Triforce.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# is on the path to #the Tower#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: Ganondorf brushes his rotten teeth with salted slug flavoured tooth paste!

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that ##the Thieves' Hideout## has #0# major items.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #the Lost Woods# is on the path to #Barinade#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Minuet of Forest#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that ##the Temple of Time## has #1# major item.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nuts (10 pieces)#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Deku Stick#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Deku Stick#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Deku Stick#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Front Left Fake Wall Chest

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that in #Gerudo Valley# the hammer unlocks #a Piece of Heart#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Minuet of Forest#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Deku Stick#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #the Fire Arrows#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that a #tent in the valley# covers a #Great Fairy Fountain#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that in the #river in the Water Temple# lies...^ #the Water Temple Boss Key# and #a Blue Rupee#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that on the path to the #right hand of the Spirit Temple# a chest and a spider hold...^ #a Blue Potion Bottle# and #a Piece of Heart#.

Spirit Temple GS Hall After Sun Block Room

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that plundering #Dodongo's Cavern# is a foolish choice.
